settings.title: Skin Care – Facial Services
settings.content: We are dedicated to helping individuals attain glowing, healthy skin.

settings.title: Medical Grade Facials at Z Center
settings.content: We are dedicated to helping individuals attain glowing, healthy skin. All facials utilize cosmeceutical/medical grade skincare brands for the highest concentration of potent ingredients resulting in outstanding results. Cruelty free, medical grade skincare.

settings.title: Facial Treatment Policies
settings.content:
On the day of your service, we suggest you arrive at least 15 minutes prior to your scheduled treatment. This will allow time to check in and sign consent forms prior to your service. Arriving late will simply limit the time for your treatment.

Your treatment will end at the scheduled time, so that the next guest will not be delayed. Spa services are arranged specifically for you, so a minimum of 24-hour’s notice is required should you need to reschedule or cancel your service.

Changes or cancellations made less than 24 hours before the start time will be charged 50% of the treatment price, no shows will be charged the full treatment price less the service charge.

settings.title: Facial Service Menu
settings.content:
Bio-Infusion Facial- 60 minutes ($200)

Our signature Bio-Infusion facial uses a medical grade hydra-dermabrasion machine which exfoliates, extracts, hydrates and infuses custom blended serums to give your skin immediate and noticeable results. This all-in-one treatment uses direct LED Red Light therapy to help heal your skin and promote collagen production as the facial is being performed while leaving your skin glowing, nourished while continuing to improve and renew the skin over the next 30 days.

Rejuvenating Anti-aging Facial- 60 minutes ($150)

Transform your skin with this gentle and invigorating facial designed for those looking for visibly brighter and healthier looking complexion. This treatment helps to deeply exfoliate the top layers of the skin, removes any impurities and topical pollutants. Collagen stimulating serums are infused with a customized hydrojelly mask leaving your skin glowing and radiant.

Clarifying Acne Facial- 60 minutes ($150)

This targeted facial helps to reduce the signs and causes of acne. A special line of products formulated to fight acne using pharmaceutical grade, micro-encapsulated Benzoyl Peroxide is used in combination with high frequency therapy, which eliminates harmful bacteria on the surface of the skin. This treatment is ideal for anyone looking to clear their problem skin. *Extractions included with this facial service

Platinum Glow facial - 60 minutes ($150)

A fresh start for your complexion. Diamond-tip vacuum exfoliation is used to deeply exfoliate away dull layers of skin and increase cell turnover. Collagen stimulating serums are infused with a customized hydrojelly mask leaving you with smooth, youthful-looking skin with a radiant glow.

settings.title: Facial Upgrades / Enhancements:
settings.content:
Excell Stem Cell Regenerative complex ($300)

Stem cells, growth factors, peptides, amino acids combined in a mineral vitamin cocktail clinically proven to improve lines, wrinkles, redness, pores and scars.

Dermal Rejuvenating Ampoule ($50)

Generates a 30-day collagen production increase and is a wonderful option used to boost and enhance your facial with no downtime

LED Light Therapy ($40)

LED light is used to stimulate rejuvenation, reduce inflammation or eliminate blemish causing bacteria from the skin

Extractions /Black head removal ($25)

Manual extraction or skin spatula is used to deep clean visible clogged pores.

settings.title: Now You Can Look Good And Feel Even Better
settings.content: Dr. Michael Zadeh | Board Certified General Surgeon
